title: Gramophone API
description: Easily add tracks to the gramophone in Leshy's cabin in Inscryption with JSON!

Tracks.description: Your music tracks. These will be added to the Gramophone in Leshy's cabin.

Track.description: A relative path to an audio file. Supported formats: MP3, WAV, OGG, AIFF.

Volume.description: Your music track's volume, between 0 and 1.
